page.title: 14CLUBS AND YOUTH ORGANISATION
page.content: Much of the social life of the area is based on the church and it's organisations for all ages.The Pres. churches have each{Woman's and Young {Wive's Associations}while the C.ofI. has the{Mother's Union.}There are badminton and indoor bowls clubs which also meet in the church halls. {Uniformed youth organisations:-} The 3 Pres. Churches have each a{Boys {Brigade Company}while 2 have{Girls {Brigade}and the other{Girl Guides. The C.ofI.has a{Church Lads Brigade } and a{Girls Friendly Society}both of which are numerically weak in N.I. Most of the churches also have{youth {clubs}especially S.Marys R.C.which has no uniformed group. {There are no youth organisations {which would bring the young people {together.}However there is a thriving Senior Citizens Club open to all.
